data.actual_result: Discord still shows you as streaming on both the member list and your profile
data.expected_result: Ending the stream should take away streaming status
data.short_description: Streaming status still shows after ending a stream
data.steps_to_repro: - start streaming (i used obs for this) - stream for any amount of time - end the stream after a little while (i streamed for almost three hours but the amount of time should not matter) - look at your status in the member list and your profile
